modName: Studded armor HD _ with original shoulder plate engraving
summary: Just a small modification of Bernabn\'s mod, to change the shoulder plate so that it looks like vanilla, for those who want to really look like Dovahkiin, in HD!!!
descriptionHtml:
Hi all,

I loved the work done by Bernabn here: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=1322

But I was so frustrated to have this flat, grey shoulder plate, so far from how Dovahkiin should look like based on the trailers... 

So I just changed the texture and normal map for the shoulder only. Hope you will enjoy if you, like me, want to have the best \"Dovahkiin looking\" character :-)

All credits go to Bernabn for his amazing texture, done from scratch
author: zezzz
